content: One of my all-time favorite RPGs, finally brought to mobile! What separates this game from other RPGs is the unique TEAM battle system. SquareEnix does a great job combining a simple yet heartwarming story with a unique and VERY satisfying battle experience. The biggest drawback is the price, but being able to play a game with NO advertisements and virtually anywhere more than makes up for it.
Please add controller support ,it is a good game but you have to play it like your using a tablet.thanks
My device note 20 ultra heat up so fast running this game

Be careful purchasing this it says by all specifications in the requirements sections I'm able to use it and even lets me install it on my tablet but when it's open it says it's not available on my device. Google play already accepted refund request due to this. Was excited to play it as I played the original for hundreds of hours on Xbox 360/Steam.
Really good port. On par with the pc release of the og version.
The worst game I ever purchased. The game is laggy and made it unplayable...
lot of lags and glitches wastes my money
Certainly not made for older phones but runs on brand new ones that are meant for gaming
Good game but please make it fullscreen for Pixel and Nokia devices.
Fun game very immersive many hours of play
Love this game played for years now and keep going back. Awesome to be able to take it mobile. Even better can do anything i need at same time
let us have a new game+ in which Rush can have his stats or atleast equipments, inventory carried over, thanks
I like it so far, my only wish is for controller support.
Just like the console original

I'm in love with Rush and Dave since the first release for 360, and I can't express how happy this made me on playing one of the most unusual RPG games ever , wich by the way..I prefer more then final fantasy too(as a big fan of the series as well) bit I'm gonna have to leave 3 stars because the only bad thing about this conversion ..is the support of the gamepad..unfortunately isn't working ..and is the only games that doesn't support it..I hope for a future update and implementation
Having a bug when connecting to PS4, XBOX ONE controllers, it can't move freely. We need the app to update about controller!!

It's a game that I'm surprised to see on Android. I cannot get the game too run on my S10 on Android 11. Works fine on Android 10 and I've in fact downgraded to play. Not sure why it has no controller support.
Can we add controller support? Pretty rough to have to connect remotely to my xbox and play it off that just to use a controller on my phone for this game.
Best Game ever

Playable on Xiaomi A2. If your patience is short, buy this, otherwise not. The touch controller is bad (for me), specially the analog and x and y axis. After my trial and error it appears my ipega pg-9087s supported almost all controls. So, I am giving this 5 stars rating.
Looks and runs amazing on my S10+.

I loved the original on Xbox 360, and I even bought the PC version years later. I've played through this game many times, and for anyone doubtful at first, each playthrough feels incredible. There's a lot to learn, and I recommend avoiding walkthroughs at least your first time aroundâ€”all of it is worth spending time expirementing with. But for the dear love of God, turn down the bloom SqEnix!!! It feels like you're watching a video taken by a smudged camera lens in bad lighting.

This is a first - the mobile port is actually better than the console or PC edition. All if the lag and refusal to load textures that plagued the XBox and PC version are gone, leaving a smooth gaming experience for one of the generations' better strategy games.
Love that they remastered it for android. The controls are decent which I was a little worried about
Worked great till android 11, now just constantly crashes on pixel 3a
You guys need to make it easier to download dis file cuz it takes to powerful of wifi it kept lagging and 20gb of data to download the 4gb file if mobile data network im not happy.
Great game if you guys test the level design first. Not a fun game if you enforce the player to exploit the mechanic and hard punishing the conventional farming methods.
Runs absolutely perfect on huawei mate 20 x kirin 980 chip set. It's also a good game
Amazing
Not what I was expecting, but that's not a bad thing. Once you catch on to the battle system and get past the beginning the game gets way better.
This game is very good, so I have nothing more to say about it, it is really good ..
Amazing port. Runs at a smooth 120hz on my note 20 ultra (snapdragon 865+)

I was pretty excited for this. But I am experiencing stuttering on playback, and the initial battle scene. Haven't gone much farther, so I don't know if the issues will persist. I am on a pretty decent phone, with 6gb of ram, so I am surprised. Am planning to upgrade to rog phone 3 as soon as it comes out, and will be kind of pissed if I have to wait that long to play this.

It works like a charm! And it looks better than the Nintendo Switch version <3! I think i've played all the versions of this game, but having it on my own phone is something priceless! I hope that someday you add controller support to this masterpiece... But besides that, this release is just awesome!!
Use high end phone and u good to go

Great game so far for android game! the good : you can run faster than the old game ( like using speed hack ) so can avoid any enemies easily. fluid gameplay on my phone without any issue. has vibrate effect in situation. high improvement graphic although on phone the bad : there is glitch when a monster did not appear in catacomb for open the gate and I must reload the game for fix the issue. need fix the camera movement need japanese voice act conclusion : I am satisfied good job

Reserving stars for more time with the game in mobile currently i am enjoying the nostalgia from the xb360 days. Not having a controllee is really bothering me. Pay the one dev to add a bit of polish.

You kinda get stuck. Not knowing wt to do next or how to exactly play the game to its fullest potential. Kinda just do good enough to move forward and end up getting stuck not knowing wt to do to make it past a certain part.
Amazing RPG Game
Like it!!! but can you at least optimize it for 2gb Ram phone.... its kinda laggy
It was a rollercoaster ride. Probably if not the best game I've ever played. Quite challenging though but awesome! Will recommend to anyone.
Best game I've ever played since the smartphone exists. Please do more games like that ( pay just once). Very good job.
Love this game. Have owned it 3 times now. Transition to android was done really well.
Wish there was a text size slider, screen hud can be small. But game plays great on Motorola Z3 Play Snapdragon 636. Thanks Square!

Great gameplay experience, happy with this game's remaster. Frame speed worked fine with Redmi note 8 (octa-core, 3GB ram) after downloading 6GB file. Graphics & gameplay remind me of Final Fantasy XII. Keys are small, it can be tough if you have large fingers. If it had the option of Jap audio with English subtitles it would be better; only the text language can be changed here. Looking forward to other SE remastered games like FVIII & Valkyrie Profile 2.
I want my money back keeps cutting me off the game an when it does work it runs slow
This...MAKES ME SO HAPPY...
A very fun game <3

I played this game when it was first released on steam in 2008. Touch controls are actually better in my opinion. This easily takes the best graphics and content for a mobile game. Given that, it drains my 3300mah battery with SD845 in 2hrs. I never imagined that I would get to play this on my phone. If SE can port TLR here, please port FF12, FF7 DoC, Infinite Undiscovery and many more i would buy it in a heartbeat :)

At last i can play this TAT i'm using snapdragon 712 and this game play smoothly...although there still glitch sometimes but its okay. For this far it run smoothly at my mobile. Thank you for releasing it for android TAT
Amazing!!

i have trouble to this games while i am playing it , i can not see the character, i done done re- installed it again but nothing happen. Can i refund my purchase and buy other games in your apps. hope you can help me to this kind of matter, thanks.

There is no frame issue on my snapdragon 855 galaxy note 10(not plus. Plus has 4gb memory more than regular note 10. Just 8gb). Until finish installation extra download data, It had bit of laggy issues but after finishing installation there was nothing issue It was very difficult to get some information regarding frame issues on galaxynote 10 but now cleared. I write this for others.
Needs controller support!

I can't open the game. After downloading, it ask for the permission to allowed data. Then goes black screen or gone to home screen. I go to settings, choose allow at the storage. Still black screen and gone to home screen. I uninstalled it. And download again. Still nothing. Can someone help. Thank you
Doe not support controllers, but description now mentions that

Honestly, the in-game effects are kind of glitchy. They clip a little too much, and the game stalls on itself too often. The cinematics are smooth, but the play and processes stutter and clip. Needs a lot of fixing. And from what I see, there are levels that make the game crash. That's not good. The game is great, but the devs better get off their lazy bums and fix what's all screwed up and screwing up further if they wanna keep this game afloat.

When im do the silent soul quest with Rhagoh npc which is going to darken forest, game suddenly stop while loading screen and then go back to my main phone screen.i try to do several times and the result still the same, And i think "well these must be some error, they're gonna fix it later". And i tend to do the main story quest WHICH GOING TO DARKEN FOREST AND THE SAME THING HAPPENS!!!! This is not what i expected from Square Enix. YOU GUYS MUST FIX COZ THIS ERROR MAKES ME CANT FINISH THIS G!!

Interesting and engaging game. I would award 5 stars if it weren't for performance issues. The frame-rate dips are, at times, crippling. Could there be an option to lower graphics quality or something to smooth out the display? Please! It's rather expensive for a mobile title. Hope someone can look into this.

Seems like an okay game if you like this style of RPGs. I just can't get past the constant vibration of my phone, it's very annoying and there's no way to turn it off. Was enough to kill the game for me in the first 20 minutes of play. Seems like you'd have to have your phone plugged in most of the time or risk it dying on you. Uninstalled.
Nice port game for android user ... please add Japanese voice
Finished download, but after i open, verifying data 99% it auto close, what should i do? My phone galaxy 9+ Pls reply
So nice
It's unbelievable how good from the original game this Android port is. I played this game on PC and later on XBOX 360 ten years ago and now I have it in my pocket ðŸ’–âœ¨
5 Stars Great Performance Tiny bit of Lagging but Overall Superb and Fantastic
It would be perfect if you include Japanese VA
Cloudsave data does not work. Whenever i change phone, i am unable to continue my progress. Please kindly fix it.
Great friggin game

This is my first time playing the last remnant, and all I can say is this game is great. It has an excellent story, great game play, amazing OST, and good graphics. Only con is that the game drops frames randomly on my Xiaomi Mi 9 with the newest Snapdragon 855 and 6GB RAM. That seems like poor optimization to me. However, the game is still worth it though. UPDATE: Had to go back to my Snapdragon 845 LG V40, game lags like crazy. Very poor optimization.
The game still has frame rates drops at some points it needs to be fixed its playable but doesnt feel good

this is the BEST!!! truly the best port ever made!!! Originally made as XBOX 360 games, this Android version carry out the best out of it... the only downside is we don't get to play it with gamepad and we can't set the graphics quality like the PC Version... Even with my phone Poco F1 Snapdragon 845, the cutscene is kinda choppy but it's still playable and considered normal...

I own this game on PC and Switch and never got around to playing it, but as a mobile game I have not been able to put it down since buying it. The graphics are rendered in the unreal engine so this game ends up looking way better than a mobile title should possibly look. The battle system is super fun & flashy once you get the hang of it! Truly a gorgeous JRPG that can make any 'ivalice' fan drool with enjoyment ðŸ¤© support Square's mobile ports so we see some PS2 era JRPGs in our pockets too!

So sorry I bought this game. I really hope they fix it. The performance is extremely horrible and the game is unoptimized, running at what feels like 15fps with severe stuttering on my Galaxy S10 Exynos. The game is unplayable currently.

Good game just love it and enjoying. Can improve on the 1. Screen lighting too dark 2. When engage Enemy the loading screen very slow. 3. Phone battery run low very fast. For no1. I need to adjust my phone screen lighting high then I can see properly. If not very dark. Overall is still a good game. Please fix it ASAP. Thank

Runs perfectly. Does not require internet connection to play. A good port of a good game with no strings attached. I support square 100% with working (non ff7 android) ports. Please continue to optimize and port 3d games (FF12, FF10)
Perfect port, games run smoothly on Rog phone 2. Might considering to add voice change in settings. The original game got the option to change the voice while this port didn't have it.
its a GREAT GAME ^^ If dev can make the control more fluid.. it will be PERFECT !!

Fantastic Port. I picked this game up on PC, but never got around to playing it. When I saw this port I had to grab it, since I probably never would have otherwise. Totally worth the asking price. Would recommend.
Another great game, now just waiting for FF X and FF XII.

Really glad this game came out for Google play store. I hope this means there will be more remasters coming. Only problems I had with this one was the opening cutscenes not working but I was able to skip it. Another problem was that there is no accept button on a controller so I had to use touchscreen controls.

No mention of it is the PC or CONSOLE version on Android, as PC is harder and more grindable and longer game of the two, being very different in that the PC version in incredibly harder and it feels like it's this one. Would appreciate a update about this, or implement a quick difficulty cap? But overall game runs perfect but knowing which game it is, very misleading Also, when you going to update the game to we can have 25units/5unions, and not stuck with 18units/5unions
It seems like a good port so far but the lack of controller support is unfortunate.

Plays great on S10+ and Galaxy Tab S4. No framerates issues on these 2 devices. Nearly perfect port of original (missing controller option is only thing keeping me from saying it is perfect). This game is for high end devices. Snapdragon 835 and 855 have zero issues. Great job by development team. I hope their ratings do not get hurt by potato phone gamers.
It's fantastic, I absolutely loved the game, just like when it came out on pc, recommended!
I been waiting to this game to come mobile
Please make this works with controller and Intel CPU.
I love this game so much I have played it's game for the Xbox and the PlayStation and the PCbðŸ˜ðŸ˜â¤â¤
Best for phone
Worth it. The tutorials are a bit hard to understand though.

An almost perfect recreation on Android, I have an S9 plus and have the required Ram and what not to play it, and the fast forward in battles and the speed boost is helpful... However the Frame rate does need work and maybe a graphic option for classic 360 graphics could help since my phone heats up after a bit of playtime, makes sense with how massive this game is but will give 5 stars for an update to fix and possibly a way to configure the controls to my liking.

If you have problems signing in, go into your device Settings -> Apps and select 'Show system apps' under the top right overflow menu. Select the 'Google Play Games' app and perform Storage -> Clear data. Press the back button twice to go back to your app list and select the 'Google Play services' system app and perform Manage storage -> Clear all data. Press the back button three times to go back to your app list and select 'LastRemnantR' app and perform Storage -> Clear data. Hope this works!

Great game! I have been waiting for this, but sometimes in the cutscene and the battle, i kinda lag a bit like it has an fps drop. I use Vivo V15 Pro. I need an answer if its the phone or the game. Anyway, i dont care about it. Because the game is 100% great

This is a really good port of a hidden-gem! I'm actually impressed how well this runs on the Galaxy Note+. I played this on the Xbox and now it's available on the phone and they kept the speed feature (which fixed the slowness of long battles). The is an excellent jrpg that runs well on the phone. In my opinion it's worth the price of admission.
